message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to enhance your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it would bring to my business.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it would bring to your business, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to compromise and offer $10,200. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it would bring to my business.
